member.name: IMFTimedTextCue.GetCueKind
member.summary: Gets the kind of timed-text cue.
member.returns: Returns a -typed value that specifies the kind of timed-text cue.

member.name: IMFTimedTextCue.GetData
member.summary: Gets the data content of the timed-text cue.
member.param: A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to the interface for the data content of the timed-text cue. This parameter can be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextCue.GetDuration
member.summary: Gets the duration time of the cue in the track.
member.returns: Returns the duration time of the cue in the track.

member.name: IMFTimedTextCue.GetId
member.summary: Gets the identifier of a timed-text cue.
member.returns: The identifier of a timed-text cue.

member.name: IMFTimedTextCue.GetLine
member.summary: Gets a line of text in the cue from the index of the line.
member.param: The index of the line of text in the cue to retrieve.
A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to the interface for the line of text in the cue.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextCue.GetLineCount
member.summary: Gets the number of lines of text in the timed-text cue.
member.returns: Returns the number of lines of text.

member.name: IMFTimedTextCue.GetOriginalId
member.summary: Gets the cue identifier that is provided in the text-track data format, if available.
member.param: The cue identifier that is provided in the text-track data format.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextCue.GetRegion
member.summary: Gets info about the display region of the timed-text cue.
member.param: A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to the interface for the timed-text region. This parameter can be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextCue.GetStartTime
member.summary: Gets the start time of the cue in the track.
member.returns: Returns the start time of the cue in the track.

member.name: IMFTimedTextCue.GetStyle
member.summary: Gets info about the style of the timed-text cue.
member.param: A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to the interface for the timed-text style. This parameter can be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextCue.GetTrackId
member.summary: Gets the identifier of the timed-text cue.
member.returns: Returns the identifier of the timed-text cue.
